name: @briebug/jest-schematic
description: Schematic to add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.build:clean:launch: npm run build && npm run clean && npm run launch
scripts.launch: npm run link:sandbox && cd sandbox && npm run && ./node_modules/.bin/ng g @briebug/jest-schematic:jest
scripts.test: npm run build:clean:launch && npm run test:sandbox && npm run clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm run lint && npm run test --no-cache && npm run build
scripts.link:sandbox: npm link && cd sandbox && npm link @briebug/jest-schematic
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"

author: Briebug
